input_text: Completing a challenging boss fight on the first attempt.
target_text: Satisfaction, pride, and accomplishment.

input_text: Losing a highly competitive online multiplayer match.
target_text: Frustration, disappointment, and determination to improve.

input_text: Discovering a hidden easter egg or secret level in a game.
target_text: Excitement, curiosity, and a sense of accomplishment.

input_text: Achieving a new high score in an arcade game.
target_text: Joy, elation, and a sense of personal achievement.

input_text: Breaking a controller due to losing a difficult level.
target_text: Anger, frustration, and regret for the loss.

input_text: Unboxing a highly anticipated video game.
target_text: Excitement, anticipation, and eagerness to start playing.

input_text: Getting a rare and valuable item drop in a loot box.
target_text: Surprise, excitement, and a feeling of luck.

input_text: Receiving toxic and offensive messages from other players.
target_text: Anger, frustration, and annoyance at the negative interaction.

input_text: Exploring a beautifully designed open-world environment.
target_text: Awe, wonder, and a sense of adventure and exploration.

input_text: Preparing and strategizing for a competitive gaming tournament.
target_text: Nervousness, excitement, and determination to perform well.

input_text: Experiencing a game-breaking glitch or bug.
target_text: Frustration, disappointment, and annoyance at the technical issue.

input_text: Solving a challenging puzzle or riddle in a game.
target_text: Satisfaction, accomplishment, and a sense of intelligence.

input_text: Encountering a jump scare in a horror video game.
target_text: Fear, startle, and an adrenaline rush.

input_text: Receiving positive feedback and compliments for your gameplay.
target_text: Happiness, pride, and validation for your skills.

input_text: Spending hours customizing and personalizing your character.
target_text: Satisfaction, creativity, and a sense of ownership.

input_text: Witnessing an emotional and impactful story in a narrative-driven game.
target_text: Sadness, empathy, and a connection to the characters.

input_text: Sergeant Major says: DROP AND GIVE ME 20!
target_text: Fear, frustration, and a sense of urgency to meet the challenge.

input_text: Exploring and taking in the breathtaking graphics of a visually stunning game.
target_text: Amazement, awe, and appreciation for the visual artistry.

input_text: Failing a timed mission by a few seconds and having to start over.
target_text: Disappointment, frustration, and determination to beat the mission.

input_text: Getting the rare achievement for completing all in-game challenges.
target_text: Pride, accomplishment, and a feeling of mastery.
